title: New Target Gene Screening Using Shortened and Random sgRNA Libraries in Microbial CRISPR Interference.
authors: Jeong SH, Kim HJ, Lee SJ
abstract: CRISPR interference (CRISPRi) screening has been used for identification of target genes related to specific phenotypes using single-molecular guide RNA (sgRNA) libraries. In CRISPRi screening, the sizes of random sgRNA libraries contained with the original target recognition sequences are large (âˆ¼10
